How do I use the `currencyconverters` API to retrieve all currencies that have a reserve ratio less than 5% VRSC?

The `currencyconverters` API actually filters currencies that have a reserve ratio greater than 10% VRSC, not less than 5% VRSC. It only returns currencies that meet this specific condition, along with having at least 1000 VRSC in reserve and having all listed currencies as reserves.

currencyconverters` API retrieves all currencies that have at least 1000 VRSC in reserve, are greater than 10% VRSC reserve ratio, and have all listed currencies as reserves
- **E.g. BTC ETH:**
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST getcurrencyconverters btc eth
```
Will return all currencies that have btc/eth markets at or above the liquidity threshold.
